name: py-nose2
description: unittest2 with plugins, the succesor to nose

dependencies.name: py-pip
dependencies.description: The PyPA recommended tool for installing Python packages.

dependencies.name: py-setuptools
dependencies.description:
A Python utility that aids in the process of downloading, building,
upgrading, installing, and uninstalling Python packages.

dependencies.name: py-cov-core
dependencies.description: plugin core for use by pytest-cov, nose-cov and nose2-cov

dependencies.name: py-mock
dependencies.description:
mock is a library for testing in Python. It allows you to replace parts
of your system under test with mock objects and make assertions about
how they have been used.
